disabled.description: If true, the InlineEdit will be disabled.

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the InlineEdit when it is not controlled.

showControls.description: show the control buttons when editing.

stateOnBlur.description: The state of the InlineEdit when it is blurred.

onChange.description: The callback function that is called when the value of the InlineEdit is changed.

onCancel.description: The callback function that is called when the InlineEdit is canceled.

onSave.description: The callback function that is called when the InlineEdit is saved.

onEdit.description: The callback function that is called when the InlineEdit is clicked.

children.description: The render function of the InlineEdit.
